feed.title: DockSTARTer Releases

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.14-2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Prompt for Stop, "Down" or "Cancel" when when stopping containers i… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/1999
  • Fix ds -u command with no branch specified by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2000
  • Split update notice to two lines by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2001

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.03.14-1...v2025.07.14-2

entry.title: New release for DockSTARTer: v2025.07.15-1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Returns an empty string as the version if the branch does not exist. by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2002
  • Return an error notice for ds --version if the branch does not exist by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2003
  • Return an error notice for ds --u if the branch does not exist by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2004
  • Return an error notice for ds --u if the branch does not exist by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2005
  • Return an error notice for ds --u if the branch does not exist (#2005) by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2006
  • Fix displaying of branch in error message with ds -u when branch do… by @CLHatch in https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/pull/2007

Full Changelog: https://github.com/GhostWriters/DockSTARTer/compare/v2025.07.14-2...v2025.07.15-1
